storyInfo: One day, Hibiscus goes to deliver medicine to Czerny as usual, only to discover that he plans to start piano classes. This has her extremely confused – what is his true objective?

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Are you here to deliver meds to Mr. Czerny again?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Sounds rough.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Er,, not that he's a bad person or anything, but it certainly would be easier if he remembered to show up for his regular treatments.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Yeah, I wish he'd be a little more mindful of his health.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But I guess that's what makes him who he is.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I'm gonna get back to work. Want to grab lunch later?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Mr. Czerny, I'm coming in.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Voice from Inside

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Based on past experience, she wouldn't normally get any sort of response, causing her to resort to more drastic measures – such as applying for a spare key card for his room.
But Czerny doesn't seem to be his usual reclusive self today, and the dorm's automatic door slides open almost immediately after his response.
What do you need?
Somewhat suspicious, she steps inside.
Strewn haphazardly across the room are leaves of sheet music, packets of various kinds of instant coffee, tomes related to Arts research, and a frowning Elafia standing in the middle of it all.
An all-too-common sight within Czerny's dorm room.
Most of the time, this scene signifies that he is deep in the creative process, and that nobody may interrupt him.
—In other words, many others from the Medical Department have already made such attempts.
However, the situation seems a little different today. There are no music scores splayed in front of him, nor does he seem to be composing anything.
If anything, this makes her somewhat angry.
Mr. Czerny, if you're not busy composing, I do hope you can remember to come to Medical for your check-up.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: We've already made a special exception for you, so please don't take it for granted.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You came at just the right time, Hibiscus.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Of course I did. After all, you've been like this for more than just a day or two now.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If I wanted to start a piano class here at Rhodes Island, and take on some students, how would I go about doing that?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Huh? Well, uh, you should go to Logistics and fill out the requisite paperwork?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Wunderbar. Thank you, I'll head over there right now.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Huh? What??
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Umm... What's this on the table...?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: His last medical report?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Wait, Mr. Czerny! You haven't had your check-up yet!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: ...I had no idea so many people would show up after we announced he would be holding classes.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Excuse me, is this where I sign up for Mr. Czerny's piano class?
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: Yes. The end of the line is right over here. Please wait a moment.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Goodness, look how long the queue is! I told you to get up earlier, but you just wouldn't listen.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: Mom, I don't wanna learn piano!
attributes.name: Repulsed Child

attributes.content: The instructor is very famous in Leithanien. If you miss this opportunity, there won't be a next time!
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: This is your one chance.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: ...Okay.
attributes.name: Repulsed Child

attributes.content: Ma'am, I've heard that Mr. Czerny can be difficult to get along with. Is there anything I should know ahead of time?
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: Uhh, I wouldn't worry too much about that.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Since coming to Rhodes Island, he's not nearly as hot-tempered as he was before.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Oh, good to hear.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: Stand up straight, be attentive, and make sure you look ready to learn. Be on your best behavior in there.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: I know...
attributes.name: Repulsed Child

attributes.content: Excuse me, is Mr. Czerny well-known even in Victoria?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hm? Aren't you his assistant? And you don't even know that much?
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: Sorry, but I'm his doctor, not his assistant. I'm only here to keep things running smoothly, just in case.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Oh, a doctor? I suppose you don't know much about music then.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: His Morgen und Abend has been making waves even through Victoria's aristocratic circles.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: Makes sense.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Though, this is quite surprising. As far as I was aware, he only came to Rhodes Island for treatment. I thought I'd be lucky to hear even a single piece from him.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: I'd always heard the maestro was rather eccentric, but I never imagined he'd be willing to start teaching. Would you happen to know why?
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: I... honestly don't know.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Maybe he wanted a change of pace.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Haha, fair enough. In any case, I'll be the envy of all the housewives once I get back from this trip.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: What's wrong, Mr. Czerny?!
attributes.name: Anxious Patient

attributes.content: Sorry, something urgent came up.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Huh? Please wait a minute!
attributes.name: Anxious Patient

attributes.content: (*whispers*) That look on his face...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: My apologies, sir. Please wait here. I'll go check on him.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus's initial assumption is that he wasn't feeling well, so she follows closely behind him.
Unexpectedly though, Czerny does not return to his room, but instead makes a turn towards the training room.
Once he arrives inside, he plants his feet in front of a sandbag and starts pounding away at it viciously.
By the looks of things, he has a lot more vigor than she expected.
That noble, that damn noble, just wouldn't stop buzzing in my ears with his superficial grasp of music.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Does he have any idea how many misconceptions his children have been forced to accept because of his self-righteousness?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Music is nothing like that! How could it be?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: His child's rejection of it is due solely to his own superficiality!
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: And the person before him! And the one before that!
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Oh, that one wasn't so bad. They only wanted their child to have an appreciation for music...
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Mr. Czerny.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: And here I was, thinking you weren't feeling well.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It's nothing much. Just venting a little frustration, as you can see.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Even back in Leithanien I used to encounter plenty of nobles like that.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: They'd send their kids to me through Gertrude, hoping I'd be able to turn them into virtuosos.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Of course, I have no objections to teaching, but the majority of them didn't even really care if their children became pianists or not.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: All they really wanted was a private performance from me, or an opportunity to strike up a conversation with Gertrude.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: And even for those that truly wanted their children to become successful, it was only to the extent that musical skills would benefit their status as nobles.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: On top of that, most of the children had already been indoctrinated into being dull or snobbish.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Or both even, a combination that makes my blood boil.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I'm glad you recommended I start exercising. It's proven to be a great outlet.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Czerny points at the sandbag.
Not everyone can be as pure as you.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I know that much.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: In the Afterglow, I had neighbors who wanted me to teach piano to their kids too, just as a hobby.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Or rather, that was true for most people.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But at the very least, they were far more charming than the nobles, which is why I vastly preferred the atmosphere there.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I don't care if people lie to me, but they should at least be honest when it comes to music.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: If you don't care for all the nobles who only show up for the prestige, then you probably shouldn't be holding classes.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Medical is also worried about your health–
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Nein, that's not an option.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I need to hold these classes. It is a challenge I must overcome.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Well, if you really don't want to deal with the guardians, I can go talk to them myself and just ask them to send their kids in.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I can even forbid them from sitting in during the lessons.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That should make things a bit easier on your end.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Oh! That's a wonderful idea.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Let's go with that.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Mr. Czerny, it's time for your exam.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Mr. Czerny?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Dr. Hibiscus, are you looking for Mr. Czerny?
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: That I am.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I believe he's in class right now.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: I thought this wasn't one of the time slots reserved for his lessons?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Oh, not his piano lessons. From what my kid's told me, he's been attending Hypatia's history lessons lately.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: Huh. I'll go take a look.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Uh, hold on, Dr. Hibiscus.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Since you're Mr. Czerny's attending physician, he's more likely to listen to you.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: There are a few things I'd like to discuss.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: Well, I can listen, but I can't make any promises.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Excellent. So this is the situation. My daughter told me she isn't able to keep up with the pace of his lessons.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: As a matter of fact, this is a common sentiment I hear among the other parents.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: We can understand his unwillingness to let us into the classroom, but you see, the pace of his class is—
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: Oh, far be it from me to suggest the maestro change how he does things, but perhaps he could consider a few small adjustments?
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: ...Are you sure that's what the kids think?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Well, it's what my child believes, at least.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: I'll bring it up with him.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Good, good. Thank you very much.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: Now then, that concludes today's class. Incidentally, this is also my last day as substitute teacher.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hypatia will be back starting tomorrow, so please look forward to it.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Thank you, Miss Istina!
attributes.name: Students

attributes.content: Thank you, Miss Istina!
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: What's going on here, Istina?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That's what I'd like to know.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: A few days ago, Mr. Czerny suddenly showed up for history class.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hypatia thought he was just fooling around at first, but he actually took the course seriously and even took detailed notes.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: The classroom is open to everyone, of course. Anyone can attend if they want.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Alright, thank you.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Mm... So that's how it is.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Whenever a student asks a question, they should be guided towards the answer, rather than corrected outright.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Their immediate understanding is far less important than building the bridge to arrive there.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Excellent. It was well worth attending this class.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Since when were you this studious?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Studious? Nein, I'm here to learn how to teach.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: It has proven to be quite troublesome.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: At first, I expected it to be similar to mentoring Ebenholz and Kreide – not particularly difficult.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: That as long as they could keep up with my playing, as long as they could experience the wonder of performance for themselves, their level would naturally improve—
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But I was wrong.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: The fact is, most people cannot achieve even that much.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: ...I think that's perfectly normal.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I won't deny that.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But regardless, it has proven an obstacle for me.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: When they ask me question after question, I don't know how to respond.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: They ask things that, by all rights, should never have needed to be asked in the first place.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: To me, the fact that they ask such questions means that their grasp of music is too superficial to even be considered beginners.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Uh, so you're here to learn how to teach?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I now deeply understand how profound the educational process can be!
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: You... really are enthusiastic about this.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Naturally.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But why?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: What do you mean, 'why?'
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Oh, my apologies, Hibiscus.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I need to head to class. Can the check-up wait until afterwards?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: ...Sure.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Mr. Czerny's been running his piano classes for quite some time now.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: A lot of our patients have been sending their kids, and some have even signed up themselves. A handful of our colleagues have been attending as well.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: It took a while to set in, but he really is crazy influential.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: What's the matter, Hibiscus? You're spacing out.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: ...I still can't figure out why he suddenly decided to hold these piano lessons.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I mean, when you've reached the very pinnacle of the craft the way he has, it's only natural to want to take on some students, isn't it?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Has he... really reached his peak?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You don't think so?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: His music is already known far and wide.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I've heard that it's even been praised by Leithanien's Twin Empresses.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Moreover, I remember you mentioning that he personally fought the lingering echoes of the Witch King during the Afterglow incident.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: And if he managed to survive even that, where else is there for him to go from there?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: If I were in his shoes, I wouldn't mind starting a class myself – make some money, live a nice, cushy life.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I don't think he's that kind of person.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Then, what kind of person is he?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: The kind who'll keep pushing the limits of music until his very last breath.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Do we not make exceptions for that sort of person precisely because of the respect we hold for them?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I suppose so. Otherwise, we would've strapped him to a table in Medical a long time ago.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: But right now, someone like him is...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Thank goodness you're here, Doctor.
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: My daughter told me that Mr. Czerny didn't hold any classes today. Is he struggling with his health?
attributes.name: Opinionated Patient

attributes.content: Please give me a minute. I'll go see what's going on.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Mr. Czerny. Mr. Czerny!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Pardon me, I'm coming in.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: As soon as Hibiscus throws open the door, waves of sound wash over her. They must've been bouncing about within the room for a long time before she arrived.
Moreover, it isn't Czerny's music. Even an amateur like her can recognize that these sounds are very juvenile.
It must be his students' performance.
Their notes are interlaced with disorder, adding an extra layer of chaos to an already chaotic room.
Hibiscus has always complained about the messiness of the room, but right now, she is far more concerned about the man collapsed in the center.
Mr. Czerny?!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Mr. Czerny!!!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: How did this happen?! All the indicators from your previous check-up were normal—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Huh? Urgh... What time is it?
attributes.name: Collapsed Czerny

attributes.content: Huh? Scheiße, I won't make it in time for my class!
attributes.name: Collapsed Czerny

attributes.content: Mr. Czerny?!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Oh, Hibiscus? Sorry, I must've overslept.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Did you come to make sure I'd head to class?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: ...No, I came to see if you were dead.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Oh. Don't you worry about that. I have no intention of dying until I've brought my students up to a satisfactory level.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: What were you doing last night?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Ah. Do you hear the music? The students made it.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I wanted to identify the problem areas, then devise a lesson plan that would better suit their needs.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: *yawns*... I suppose I've been a bit sleep-deprived as of late.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I have a question.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: The Czerny I know is a musician brimming with a passion for the arts.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But now, you're suddenly pouring all your energy into teaching.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: To be honest, I'm a little afraid.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Of what?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Of the fact that you're acting like someone who's ready to give up on life.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Like someone who no longer cares about his own future, and simply wants to find a successor.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm a doctor, and I understand the pain and suffering that come with Oripathy. I'm not asking you to face it with a smile on your face.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: However, you've come here to Rhodes Island. You should at least place your faith in us, and confront this challenge together!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Wait, hold on. You think I've given up on life? Me?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Let me get this straight. You think I've lost my will to live, and am desperately trying to find a successor before facing my own death?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: ...Pretty much, yeah.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Is that really how I come across to you?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: There is one thing I won't deny though.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: When I was performing for the people of the Afterglow, sometimes I got the idea that someday I'd be standing on even grander stages, surrounded by even more people, and stirring their hearts with music.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But when I saw my medical report, it became clear to me that would never happen.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I don't curse my fate. Even if I weren't wracked with Oripathy, I would still inevitably die one day.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But even before that, I'd already experienced the greatest heights a musician could aspire to. I've been luckier than most.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: However, obviously that was not enough for me.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I wanted to go further. I wanted to hear more. I wanted to keep composing.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Which is why I offered these lessons.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: In other words, you didn't start this because you lost your will to live, but rather, you see it as a continuation?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That's not entirely true either.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: It's rather difficult for me to explain it to you cogently.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Czerny is deep in thought for a while. He walks over to the window, and points to a mountain in the distance.
Let's put it this way.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Just as with many other endeavors in this land, music is a distant pinnacle that can never truly be reached.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: My calling is simply to keep climbing that mountain until the end of my life.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But obviously, I cannot.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Even without Oripathy, there would inevitably come a day where I would be forced to descend.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But I do not see that as a tragedy. It's simply accepting fate.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: These children who've received my instruction will traverse the paths I've walked. They will reach the places I've reached, and then they will aspire to even greater heights.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I hope to do this, just as many of my teachers did, and my teacher's teachers before them.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Through the process of teaching, they... No, I, do not think that my life is over. Rather, my life is continuing through music.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Because, while we are descending the mountain with a cane, these children will be happily embarking on their own journey to conquer music–
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Just as we had done.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Just like the sun itself. At any given moment, it is both rising, and setting.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Oh, right. Before I forget, I've actually been working on something the last two days. I'd appreciate it if you could look it over.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: As Czerny says this, he pulls out a stack of papers from a messy pile of documents and hands them to Hibiscus.
Hibiscus's eyes are immediately drawn to the header – 'Request for Research Funding - Application Form.'
What's this...?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: For a Leithanian, and myself especially, the synthesis of music and Arts is second nature.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: But this might not be such an easy thing to understand for people from other countries.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I've analyzed this extensively, and feel that it has great potential. So, I've requested research funding for that very purpose.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: So, how's that? That should address some of your concerns, no?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: ...I don't buy it.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: You might act like you're brimming with energy, but you haven't been taking care of your health. Just like back then.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If you really care so much about taking on good students, then you should take better care of your own body, for their sake.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: ...I must say, that's the most convincing bit of medical advice I've ever heard.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: In any case, hand me those documents.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Now then, you should head to class.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Nein, nein, Hibiscus, that won't do. Can you go tell my students that today's class will be pushed back an hour?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: What are you going to do?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I can't let my students see me like this.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I'll need some time to wash up and take care of my hands.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: *sigh*... Sure, whatever you say.
attributes.name: Hibiscus
